RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+rKobold &+RChieftain's&n&+y Bedroom&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is as lavishly furnished as can be expected for a Kobold. There is a large bed in the center of the room, upon which a Troll could rest comfortably. Around the room are various war trophies and tapestries, most stolen from Human or Elven towns. The room has a musty odor to it, and the sheets on the bed haven't been changed in quite some time.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yMain Living Area of the &+RChief's&n&+y Hut&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This place hasn't been cleaned in a while. Bones and remnants from various meals are scattered about the room. Underneath the mess, the room has been decorated with many items of Human and Elven manufacture. The corpse of one of the chief's rivals rests in the middle of the room due to a failed assasination attempt. It has been left here to rot as a warning to any would-be assailants.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yEntryway of the &+RChief's&n&+y Hut
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The Kobold Chief's hut is to the south. It is much larger than any structure in the village, save the barracks. As a testament to Kobold humor, a sign that reads "&+cWelcome to &+CSylvandawn&n&+c. May you enjoy your stay.&n" The area is relatively narrow, allowing only one person to pass at a time.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yRoad to the &+RChief's&n&+y Hut&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The road here is fairly narrow. To the south you see the Kobold Chieftain's hut. The edge of the road is marked by leg bones of some unidentified animal placed every few feet.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yNearing a Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The road here is covered with various debris and refuse. To the north and west you see an overgrown field. At the edge of the road there is the occasional rotting rat carcass. This sort of thing would normally be used for a Kobold's dinner, but these have been overlooked. To the south another path intersects this road, it appears to be the road to the Chief's hut.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Many various kinds of vegetables grow in the gardener's fields. Among the weeds grow corn, tomatoes, peas, cucumbers, and watermelon in an unplanned and unmaintained fashion. The weeds appear to be the dominant vegetable, however.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Many various kinds of vegetables grow in the gardener's fields. Among the weeds grow corn, tomatoes, peas, cucumbers, and watermelon in an unplanned and unmaintained fashon. The tomatoes should have been harvested days ago, but instead they lay rotting in the field.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Many various kinds of vegetables grow in the gardener's fields. Among the weeds grow corn, tomatoes, peas, cucumbers, and watermelon in an unplanned and unmaintained fashion. The corn is stunted, and bugs appear to have eaten most of the edible parts.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Many various kinds of vegetables grow in the gardener's fields. Among the weeds grow corn, tomatoes, peas, cucumbers, and watermelon in an unplanned and unmaintained fashion. What is hopefully only dog feces litters this field at random intervals.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Many various kinds of vegetables grow in the gardener's fields. Among the weeds grow corn, tomatoes, peas, cucumbers, and watermelon in an unplanned and unmaintained fashion. Beetles munch away at the peas, but by the looks of them, they are probably getting indigestion.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Field&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Many various kinds of vegetables grow in the gardener's fields. Among the weeds grow corn, tomatoes, peas, cucumbers, and watermelon in an unplanned and unmaintained fashion. This isn't so much a garden as it is a place where someone accidentally spilled a bunch of seeds.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. There is litter and miscellaneous debris strewn about the area, a testament to the tidiness of the average Kobold. To the north is the Fruithouse of the village.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yAn Intersection in the Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. Some of the weeds are so tall as to nearly be trees or bushes.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Fork in the Road at the Entrance to the &+rKobold&+y Village&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The road here splits in two directions. The road to the east appears to be more heavily used than the road to the west. To the south is the &+bwatering&n hole. The dirt path here is littered with all manner of rubbish.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yEntrance to the &+rKobold&+y Village&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The enclosed path opens up here into a large open area populated, or littered rather, with poorly constructed huts and ramshackle buildings. A large wooden fence about fifteen feet tall stands to the south, keeping out intruders as long as they don't have torches or the strength to remove a badly-nailed-on board. However, to the lazy and unmotivated, this place is like a fortress.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. On one side of the road is what appears to be chunks of partially digested food. Looks like someone hit the whiskey bottle a little harder than was necessary.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. A few patches of fur are left here on the ground where either someone's dog or a town resident had some of their hair pulled out.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. In this area, there are more weeds than there is path. To the east is the &+ycarpenter's shop&n.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. Pieces of what can be identified as a broken chair rest in the middle of the road here. To the west lies the main entertainment of the town.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yEntrance to the &+RFruit&+Ghouse&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n To the north you see the "Fruithouse". Named by the chief, the Fruithouse is where the Kobolds who are too crazy or inept to be let into Kobold society are kept.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+RFruit&+Ghouse&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The fruithouse is a bizarre place, being a bizarre combination of prison and playground. Sharp objects and ruined furniture litters the room, along with various carcasses of small animals. A psychopath could have some real fun here.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yCommons Room of the &+RFruit&+Ghouse&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where most of the action happens in the Fruithouse. "Action" usually refers to drooling on yourself or chewing on furniture in this case, but the occupants don't seem to care.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+ySleeping Quarters of the &+RFruit&+Ghouse&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is where the occupants of the Fruithouse sleep. They don't so much sleep as get beat in the head with a mallet until they are unconscious, and then get thrown into a pile of moldy hay. The moldy hay is comfortable, however, so this would not be considered cruelty.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is in obvious disarray, with a rusty bed turned on its side and miscellaneous belongings strewn about. A mattress, torn in half, rests in the center of the room.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. Broken glass is scattered about the area, some of which seems to have flecks of dried blood upon it. To the west lies the bratpen.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This place looks more like a stable than a dwelling, with mounds of straw throughout the room. Small stones are scattered about the room for no apparent reason.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. A hole has been dug into the middle of the road and filled with bunch of moldy rags. To the east and west are Kobold homes. The Road continues north and south.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This place looks like your average Kobold home. The place is not fit for civilized beings, but it suits a Kobold quite well. A broken mandolin hangs from the ceiling by a string that has been tied to a support beam. Its counterpart, a bent and rusty flute, has been stuck through a hole in the wall. It looks like someone had gotten very angry and tried to attack the house with it.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This building contains no furnishings. Upon the floor is a large pile of hay and a small pile of fur. The smell of rotting flesh emanates from the pile of hay. That must be where the owner stashed his lunch for safekeeping.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Bratpen
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This dwelling, just like the rest in the village, is a terrible mess. This is the place they call the "bratpen", since it is where the residents leave their brats when they are tired of them. In the corner is what appears to be the decomposing corpse of a baby kobold.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Brothel
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You stand in the entryway to the kobold brothel. Behind a curtain to the west you hear strange noises. The room is modeled after a low-class Human brothel, but is done badly and cheaply and barely resembles a brothel at all. It actually looks more like a dirty common room.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+WBack Room&n of the Kobold Brothel
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is thoroughly dedicated to debauchery. Dozens of large, stained pillows carpet the floor. A few strange object that can only be identified as either torture devices or pleasure implements litter therea. This place is definitely not sanitary.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Rarely Traveled Path&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This part of the road is overgrown with weeds. The smell of rotting fish hangs about the area, and is stronger to the south. The scent may be a little unpleasant, but is a nice change from the smell of feces and rotting bodies.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+bThe Edge of a Pond&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n At the end of the road are two fisherman's huts and a dirty pond. Broken fishing poles lie strewn about at the edge of the water. The smell of rotting fish is in the air. The grass is very thick and green right here, probably from the proximity to the pond and the rotting fish carcasses scattered about.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+bA Fish&+german&+b's Home&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This dwelling is sparsely furnished and relatively clean. An old, moth- eaten tapestry hangs on the southern wall, depicting a band of elves being slaughtered by a tribe of Orcs riding worgs. Three rickety chairs have been placed in the room facing the tapestry. This would ordinarily seem somewhat odd, but since the tapestry is the most interesting object in the room, it is quite normal.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+bA &+rKobold &+BFish&n&+german&+b's Home&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The fisherman's home has various poles and tackle boxes scattered about, along with fishbones and dried-up worms. A few rotting fish carcasses are tacked to the walls, as mementos of some of the fisherman's catches. The largest fish is about eleven inches long.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+BA Medium-Sized Fishing Pond&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The water in this pond is rather disgusting, and quite likely undrinkable. It is surprising that fish manage to survive in this muck. A strong smell of mold and mildew hangs in the area. A few fish bodies float on the surface of the water.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA &+gFarmer&+y's Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Piles of vegetables lie rotting in the gardener's home. Not only are very few of the villagers interested in buying from the harvest, anyone that would want something would just take it from the field.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe Kobold Carpenter's Shop
RoomTemplate.Description: &n Various boards and broken pieces of furniture are scattered throughout the room. Of the dozens of chairs that lie about, it is unlikely that a single one would support a person's weight and not give them dozens of splinters.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+BA Kobold Pond&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The water in this pond is rather disgusting, and quite likely undrinkable. It is surprising that fish manage to survive in this muck. The water here is thicker than most soups, but is obviously less tasty.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+BA Kobold Pond&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The water in this pond is rather disgusting, and quite likely undrinkable. It is surprising that fish manage to survive in this muck. This water could be used as a pesticide, since it is capable of killing any and all vegetation within miles of an area. On the other hand, it may cause rampant vegetable growth and cause the weeds to become sentient.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA &+LRocky&N&+y Path Leading to the &+rKobold&+y Village&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You are surrounded on both sides by tall ledges of rock, from which an attacker could easily hit a target standing in the relatively narrow pass with projectiles or boulders, provided the attacker was not as clumsy as the average Kobold.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA &+LRocky&N&+y Path&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You are surrounded on both sides by tall ledges of rock, from which an attacker could easily hit a target standing in the relatively narrow pass with projectiles or boulders. Competence of the attacker is assumed in this case.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA &+LRocky&n&+y Path&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You are surrounded on both sides by tall ledges of rock, from which an attacker could easily hit a target standing in the relatively narrow pass with projectiles or boulders if the target stood in one place.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. Among the weeds are an assortment of field mice and things that like to eat field mice.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cA &+rKobold&+c Guard Post&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is plain and nearly empty, with only a table and chairs. The table and chairs are also nearly empty, containing only most of a deck of cards.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+rThe Kobold &+LBlacksmith&n&+r's Shop
RoomTemplate.Description: &n A badly-build forge blazes at the far end of the room. The floor is lined with pieces of broken and twisted metal from the many failures of the blacksmith. Prices here are probably high in order to compensate for the wasted materials.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Split in the Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. A wagon wheel rests against a nearby building. There is no evidence of wagon tracks, but the wheel appears to be brand new. To the east is the path to the Kobold mines. To the west and south the road continues.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road Leading to the &+rKobold &+LMines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This dusty road appears to be well-travelled. Though this area is not a main part of the village, mining is a large part of the Kobolds' lives, so this area gets a lot of traffic. Various rocks and pieces of ore are scattered about here.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. Thousands of ants have gathered on something that resembles a piece of cake. It is hard to tell, however, since the ants cover it so well. To the east, behind a door covered in &+rblood&n, sounds like a lot of drunken shouting.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+RThe &n&+rBleeding&+R Pig&n&+y Inn and Bar&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The owners of this establishment pride themselves on its appearance. Various stuffed, mangled, and mutilated pig and boar heads adorn the walls, and the place has a general stench of vomit and perspiration to it. A sign on the wall reads "No brawling unless you buy a drink first."

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. A few of the weeds have old and dirty socks placed over them. Apparently someone wanted to use them as an impromptu clothesline.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cThe &+rKobold&+c Barracks&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The barracks are quite clean compared to the rest of the Kobold village. The reason they are clean is because there is nothing in them. Since they are too cheap to buy beds, the leaders of the town make their soldiers sleep on the ground.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cThe General's Quarters and Office&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is nowhere near as clean as the rest of the barracks. The Kobolds must put all their junk in this room in order to keep the rest of the barracks clean. This room also serves as the office for the military commander.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. For some strange reason, the smell of fresh-baked doughnuts hangs in the air.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe Home of &+YDogface&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The walls of this dwelling are decorated with various scalps and war trophies. The floor is covered carpeted in bearskin rugs. This dwelling appears to be inhabited by someone more civilized than the rest of the town's residents, since all of the trash is on the floor rather than on the table and chairs.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. A large moldy log rests here at the edge of the road. Upon the log are growing various mushrooms and lichens. To the east is an abandoned bakery, and to the south is a butcher shop. To road continues north and west.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cThe Kobold &+RButcher&n&+c's Shop&n
RoomTemplate.Description: This room is a bloody mess. Apparently the baker was getting much too good at his trade and started to cut into the butcher's business. Since the butcher was much more fond of his business than he was of the baker, he decided to do something about it. The blood and organ tissue is actually scattered upon the walls in a somewhat artistic fashion, which could be nothing other than purely accidental.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. An old shoe with a large hole in it is partially buried into the ground here. To the south is a kobold home.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This home is a mess, just like most of the other kobold dwellings in the village. Refuse is piled up to waist-height in some parts of the room. However, much of the refuse seems to be organized by color, with brown toward the front of the room and green and gray toward the back. Two of the support beams are missing from this building and it is strange that it is still standing.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe Crossroads&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. The dirt here is discolored by something that would probably be oil of somesort. To the north lies the bank of the village, and to the east, west, and south the road continues.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+YThe &n&+rKobold&n&+Y Bank&n
RoomTemplate.Description: This building was once a home, but the deceased owner just doesen't seem to care that it was converted into a bank. The place was not really cleaned up at all, and its surprising that the body was actually removed. A few stains mark the floor where the previous resident was found. A counter has been fashioned out of old crates balanced precariously upon one another.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Path&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This path leads to the village refuse heap. A hideous smell assails your nostrils from the south. This smell is not much different from the rest of the smells found in this village, but it is more potent.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Path&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This path leads to the village refuse heap. A hideous smell assails your nostrils from the south. The smell is not much different from the rest of the smells found in this village, but it is quite a bit more potent, to the point of causing intense nausea.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+rKobold &+gRe&+Gfu&n&+gse&n&+y Heap&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The village refuse heap is not a pretty sight. In addition to the usual trash, the pile is littered with dead bodies, a few live bodies, fecal matter, broken weapons, copper and silver pieces nobody wanted. A severed head rests atop the pile with a large, goofy grin upon it. It almost looks like the head is happy that it was able to make it to the top of the pile. Someone in this place has a very strange, sick sense of humor.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This road is one of the main pathways through the Kobold village. It is lined with the occasional piece of refuse, and the edges of the road are overgrown with weeds. Wooden eating utensils litter the road here, unwashed of course.

RoomTemplate.Title: A &+rKobold&n Home
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This filthy home is a haven for pestilence and disease. Bugs crawl, fly, or scurry about freely, munching on refuse, kobolds, and each other. Pestilence and disease are quite normal here, so it has probably not been noticed yet.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yEntrance to the &+cShaman's&+y Hut&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room would be hard to distinguish from the refuse heap. The main difference is that most of the items in this room have strange designs carved into them and are generally more intricate than the items one would find in the refuse heap. A shelf on the wall houses a few severed heads, but there is a spot where one is obviously missing.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yBack of the &+cShaman's&+y Hut&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room would be hard to distinguish from the refuse heap. The main difference is that most of the items in this room have strange designs carved into them. In fact, there is a sign posted here that states that anyone that walks into this room will have strange designs carved upon their bodies, too.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Road Leading to the &+rKobold &+LMines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This dusty road appears to be well-travelled. To the north, a lean-to has been erected to serve as shelter for the tired miners. A trail of dust and dirt leads into the lean-to from the east.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yEntrance to the &+rKobold&n&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This dusty road appears to be well-travelled. To the east you see the main entrance to the mines. The rock wall to the south appears to have been carved into a makeshift sort of shelter.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n A hole has been carved into the rock downward at an angle. A ladder has been attached to the edge of the entrance, even though even the drunkest Kobold would probably be able to climb up or down easily without it. Knowing that the Kobolds are not normally concerned with safety, it seems strange having a ladder in the first place.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &N&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable. To the north is the Kobold prison.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This part of the mines has been plundered of all its resources. It has been converted into the prison area. To the casual observer the entire Kobold village probably looks like a place that would serve as an adequate prison. However, this is the only place that actually has bars.

RoomTemplate.Title: Entrance to the &+rKobold &+LPrison&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a place most Kobolds hope they never see. Though life in the village is generally unpleasant, it gets a lot more unpleasant once they travel down this hallway.

RoomTemplate.Title: The &+rKobold &+LPrison&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a place most Kobolds hope they never see. Though life in the village is generally unpleasant, it gets a lot more unpleasant once they travel down this hallway.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cA Guard Post&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This area is quite dull, being furnished only with a chair and a table. The walls have been drawn on with a piece of charcoal. There is nothing Really interesting, just a multitude of shapes and doodles drawn by a bored guard.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Hallway Between Cells&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This barren hallway is lined with prison cells to the north and south. The bars of the cells are crooked and badly fashioned, but the metal appears strong enough to keep prisoners inside.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Hallway Between Rows of Cells&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This barren hallway is lined with prison cells to the north and south. The bars of the cells are crooked and badly fashioned, but the metal appears strong enough to keep prisoners inside, provided they are kept well fed. An undernourished prisoner could probably squeeze through the bars with room to spare.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Hallway Between Rows of Cells&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This barren hallway is lined with prison cells to the north and south. The bars of the cells are crooked and badly fashioned, but the metal Appears strong enough to keep prisoners inside. The rats, however, can travel freely.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe Torture Chamber&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is quite sickening. Torture devices fill the room from end to end, may of them with pieces or chunks of victims still attached to them. In the center of the room is a table with so many attachments and devices attached to it that it would make even a gnome gasp in astonishment.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &N&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &N&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by sturdy wooden beams that closely resemble those used in most of the Kobold homes.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yEntrance to the &+rKobold &+LRogue's Guild&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n It seems odd that the Kobolds would form a rogue's guild. After all, all Kobolds are basically thieves in one way or another.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold &+LMines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable. A few pieces of broken mining tools litter the ground here.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the ground would just shake a little.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if there weren't so many of the rotting beams placed here for support.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable. However, the rock here is much more stable than the average Kobold psyche.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe &n&+rKobold&+L Mines&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yAn Abandoned&+L Mine Shaft&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if someone were to sneeze in this room. The area seems a bit damp.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+bA Flooded &+LMine Shaft&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a flooded mine shaft, with water up to about shoulder-level for a kobold. The area flooded when the miners struck the bottom of the pond in the village. Most of the minerals had been extracted from the area by the time the area flooded. The ceiling is not reinforced and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+BBottom of the Pond&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is the area that the miners accidentally tunneled into. The bottom of the pond is littered with the types of things that would make the water undrinkable if anyone noticed them. Since nobody knows what's in it, though, the water is perfectly safe to drink.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA &n&+rKobold&+L Mine&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were a little heavier.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA &n&+rKobold&+L Mine&N
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable. A few termites can be seen crawling on the beams.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA &n&+rKobold&+L Mine&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable. A few rocks are scattered here in positions just perfect for someone to trip and break their neck.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA &n&+rKobold&+L Mine&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by rotting wooden beams and would probably collapse if the rock here were less stable.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA &n&+rKobold&+L Mine&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a barren mine shaft. All of the valuable minerals have been extracted from the area and the miners have moved on. The ceiling is reinforced by a sheet of metal and two metal poles. How this arrangement can provide any support is a mystery.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LAn Active Mining Site&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is one of the main mining sites for the kobold village. The area is very rich in many different types of metals, thus keeping the miners quite busy.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LAn Active Mining Site&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is one of the main mining sites for the kobold village. The area is very rich in many different types of metals, thus keeping the miners quite busy.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+LMiner&n&+y's Barracks&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This soot-covered room is lined with a few blackened beds. Hammers, picks, and wooden clubs litter the room. What the clubs are for is a mystery, but one would assume that they are used as mining tools of some sort.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Cell&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The bars of this cell are all bent out of shape. Its occupant was able to mangle the gate but was just too huge to get out. Bones of previous occupants cover the floor.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Cell&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a plain, unfurnished prison cell. Carvings and scratchmarks adorn the walls and various refuse litters the floor. Mold grows all over the ceiling in this cell.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Cell&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a plain, unfurnished prison cell. Carvings and scratchmarks adorn the walls and various refuse litters the floor. A few pieces of tattered clothing are piled in the corner.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Cell&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a plain, unfurnished prison cell. Carvings and scratchmarks adorn the walls and various refuse litters the floor. A few piles of hay are piled here, thus making this a luxury suite.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Cell&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a plain, unfurnished prison cell. Carvings and scratchmarks adorn the walls and various refuse litters the floor. A hole has been dug here for the placement of fecal matter.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Cell&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is a plain, unfurnished prison cell. Carvings and scratchmarks adorn the walls and various refuse litters the floor. Rusty iron nails litter the floor of this cell.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cThe &+rKobold&+c Barracks&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The barracks are quite clean compared to the rest of the Kobold village. The remains of some pink lingerie rests here on the ground in shreds.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+cThe &+rKobold&+c Barracks&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The barracks are quite clean compared to the rest of the Kobold village. It is probably because they are totally empty.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+rKobold &+LRogues' Guild&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You stand in the main hallway of the rogues' guild. Oddly enough, nobody has killed you for being here yet. Wait a few minutes and things will get better.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+rKobold &+LRogues' Guild&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This hallway is plain and bare, with little decoration and less than the usual Kobold debris. To the west, the hallway appears to open into a wider area.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yThe &+rKobold &+LRogues' Guild&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You stand above a large refuse pit. Standing in something of this sort is obviously worse than standing above it, so falling might be a bad Idea.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe Rogues' Guild&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You stand in the main hallway of the rogues' guild. Oddly enough, nobody has killed you for being here yet. Maybe you should kill yourself to liven things up a bit.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe Master's Chambers&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is lavishly decorated and is obviouly the home of someone quite possessed by greed and self-love. Tapestries stolen from various far-off places adorn the walls, and the furnishings are more than extravagant.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Hallway&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n You stand in the main hallway of the rogues' guild. Oddly enough, nobody has killed you for being here yet. Someone should be along shortly to rectify the situation.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Shady Shop&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the guild members unload most of their stolen goods. Sometimes they try to steal from the keeper, but when that happens most of the attempted thief ends up in the refuse pit.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+rThe Training Grounds&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the rogues practice robbing, mugging, killing, and pillaging each other. Blood stains the floor, walls, and even parts of the ceiling. A few mutilated and mangled practice dummies rest in a corner here.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+rThe Training Grounds&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the rogues practice robbing, mugging, killing, and pillaging each other. Blood stains the floor, walls, and even parts of the ceiling. A severed arm or two rest here, waiting to be cleaned up.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LA Meeting Room&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room has tables and chairs placed about in a haphazard fashion. Upon many of them are tattered maps, many with tears and various things scrawled illegibly upon them. This has probably been done in order to give the illusion that someone in this guild is capable of making plans of some sort.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe Living Quarters&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the young rogues bed down after a long day of stealing from each other. It is not uncommon for them to be killed by their fellow bunkmates, and the beds are so disgusting it would be safer to sleep on the floor.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe Living Quarters&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the young rogues bed down after a long day of stealing from each other. It is not uncommon for them to be killed by their fellow bunkmates, and the beds are so disgusting it would be safer to sleep on the floor.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+LThe Master's Chambers&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room is lavishly decorated and is obviouly the home of someone quite possessed by greed and self-love. Tapestries stolen from various far-off places adorn the walls, and the furnishings are more than extravagant. In fact, they are downright hideous. Hideous is quite expensive these days, however, so this junk should fetch a pretty penny.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yAn Abandoned Bakery&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This place appears to have been abandoned in a hurry. Loaves of bread and various baked goods lie about the building,and an unbaked batch of dough sits atop a counter, waiting to be baked. The oven appears to have run out of fuel and burnt itself out.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+bThe Sleeping and &+LDying&n&+b Quarters of &+RThe &n&+rBleeding&+R Pig&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the members of the Kobold village come to pass out, or sometimes even die when they have had too much to drink. There are a few ragged, stained blankets lying on the floor, upon which lie a few ragged, stained Kobolds. Bugs crawl about freely, munching on various Kobolds and swimming about in the pools of vomit.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+YThe Kitchen of &+RThe&n &+rBleeding &+RPig&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room resembles an outhouse more than a kitchen in some respects. Chunks of raw meat lie about, making the flies happy. A large pile of what can only guess are intestines rests in the middle of the floor. Whether they belong to one of the guests or are prospective dinner is anyone's guess. Probably both.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Smelly &+gRefuse&+y Pit&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This is where the members of the rogues' guild throw their trash. Among broken equipment and remnants of food scraps are scattered rotting bodies, mostly those of kobolds, but you recognize other humanoid forms intermingled with them.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+bThe Watering Hole&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n In this room is what appears to be a failed attempt at constructing a fountain. The fountain serves as the only semi-drinkable water source in the Kobold village, since they tend to let their trash spill over into the fishing pond.

RoomTemplate.Title: A Hideout
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room serves as a hideout for a few of the Kobold rogues. It is not very well-hidden, but its inhabitants are ferocious enough to keep out most intruders. The place is dirty and has a few bodies here and there, most fairly well-decomposed. Other than that, the place is dirty and unfurnished.

RoomTemplate.Title: A Hideout
RoomTemplate.Description: &n This room serves as a hideout for a few of the Kobold rogues. It is not very well-hidden, but its inhabitants are ferocious enough to keep out most intruders. The place is dirty and has a few bodies here and there, most fairly well-decomposed. Other than that, the place is dirty and unfurnished.

RoomTemplate.Title: &+yA Cluttered Dugout&n
RoomTemplate.Description: &n The rock wall here has been carved into a dugout of sorts, which serves as shelter for a few kobolds. The roof is no more than a few rotting pieces of cloth draped between pairs of sticks. The sticks also appear to be rotting and a gust of wind - or even a gentle breeze looks like it would bring everything down. On the ground are a few scattered piles of hay that serve as beds for the residents.

ObjTemplate.Name: sword broadsword rusty
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A &+yrusty&+c sword&n lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: sword barbed bastard
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An angry-looking sword rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: sloppy suit chain chainmail armor
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A plain-looking suit of chain rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: cloak elfskin
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: There is a pile of dried-up flesh in the middle of the floor.

ObjTemplate.Name: dagger thin throwing
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dagger with a thin blade rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: crossbow
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A crossbow rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: sword long bent
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A bent sword lies on the ground here.

ObjTemplate.Name: sword short shortsword scratched
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A small sword rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: gloves rabbit
ObjTemplate.ShortDescription: &+ya pair of gloves lined with &+Wrabbit fur&n
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A pair of gloves is lying here.

ObjTemplate.Name: khopesh blunt blunted
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dull sword rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: scimitar
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A scimitar sits here, waiting for you to kill someone with it.

ObjTemplate.Name: pike rusting spear rusty
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A rusty spear is sitting here, getting duller by the minute.

ObjTemplate.Name: axe blood mithril
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An axe rests here, so covered in gore you hardly recognize the metal beneath.

ObjTemplate.Name: shield totemed
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An intricately carved shield rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: leather armor suit green
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A suit of green-tinted leather armor rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: salamander ring signet
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A ring with an engraved lizard is here.

ObjTemplate.Name: tarnished bronze breastplate
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An old &+ybronze&n breastplate lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: old chain chainmail sleeves
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: Some chainmail sleeves have been left here.

ObjTemplate.Name: patched suit ring mail
ObjTemplate.ShortDescription: a p&+La&ntched suit of r&+Li&nng ma&+Li&nl
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A beat-up suit of armor rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: cloak tattered
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: An old, worn cloak rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: scarf blood stained rag
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A bloody rag rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: boots muddy
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A &+ydirty&n pair of boots rest here.

ObjTemplate.Name: leather wrist guard
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A leather wrist guard lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: corpse dwarf
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: The corpse of a Dwarf is lying here.

ObjTemplate.Name: helmet dented
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A helmet with a big dent in it is lying here.

ObjTemplate.Name: leather pants old
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A pair of stretched-out, frayed leather pants rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: leather halter top
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A small piece of leather rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: whip leather
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A whip has been left here.

ObjTemplate.Name: corpse kobold
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: The corpse of a Kobold is lying here.

ObjTemplate.Name: loaf bread moldy
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+yA half-eaten chunk of &+gfuzzy&+y bread rests here.&n

ObjTemplate.Name: corpse baker
ObjTemplate.ShortDescription: the corpse of the kobold baker
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: The Kobold Baker lies here, hacked to pieces by the butcher.

ObjTemplate.Name: apron bloody brain cloth
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A cloth that was used to clean up a broken head lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: crystalline dagger crystal
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A &+Wcrystal&n dagger lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: hammer granite
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A hammer with a head of stone rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: meat rotting chunk
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A piece of &+Rmeat&n is lying here.

ObjTemplate.Name: pool murky fountain water
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: &+bA pool of &n&+ymurky&n&+b water is here.

ObjTemplate.Name: claymore two
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A huge sword lies here.

ObjTemplate.Name: flesh baker
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A chunk of Kobold is lying here.

ObjTemplate.Name: dagger ivory
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dagger with an &+Wivory&n hilt rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: dagger dull iron
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dull blade rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: dagger polished steel
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dagger rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: dagger ancient ancients blood
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dagger of excellent craftsmanship rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: dagger polished steel
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A dagger rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: leather armor suit grey
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A suit of grey-tinted leather armor rests here.

ObjTemplate.Name: bloody pair combat knuckles metal
ObjTemplate.FullDescription: A piece of metal is here, waiting for you to punch someone in the head wit it.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: &n The Mistress Elsie appears to be earning her living. After being discarded by Gwark for her younger sister Islie, she has turned to Gralik for support. She is quite busy at the moment and doesen't notice your presence.
MobTemplate.Description: An aging Kobold rests here, trying to look attractive.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Gralik seems to have taken over all of his father's duties as leader of the Kobold village. He doesen't seem to care that you are in the room.
MobTemplate.Description: Gralik stands here, trying to look important.

MobTemplate.PlayerName: kobold half-kobold halfkobold child half dog human
MobTemplate.FullDescription: This bastard half-breed is the product of one of the many raping and pillaging raids into Taeraak. Apparently his Human mother just didn't have the heart to have him slaughtered like she should have, and instead sent him to the Kobold village to be uncared for.
MobTemplate.Description: A dog-faced human boy stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This fellow's duties are restricted to raping and pillaging the nearby human civilizations. It's the first part he especially enjoys.
MobTemplate.Description: A heavily-armored &+rkobold&n stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This immensely inebriated Kobold has been trying for the last half hour to drink another mug of beer. Unfortunately for him, he hasn't been able to figure out where exactly on his face his mouth happens to be. He is drenched with beer and reeks more than your average Kobold.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n slouches here, covered in &+ybeer&n.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This bored Kobold is lazily wandering about, scratching himself in various places. Maybe the bugs would go away if he bathed. His equipment is in poor shape, and it is clear that he is definitely not one of the favorites of the Kobold guard.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold wanders about here, looking for someone to mess with.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold has been trained in the slaughter of women and children. He has very little real battle skills, but if someone were to tell him that, he would still quite likely poke a few holes in the offender.
MobTemplate.Description: An armed &+rKobold&n walks about here, carrying an attitude bigger than his sword.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: &n This Kobold is unusually large for his race. He is well-muscled and looks as though he has been in many a fight that his opponent didn't walk away from. He snarls as you look in his direction.
MobTemplate.Description: A burly Kobold stands here, looking for an excuse to kill someone.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Zugwog isn't much of a shaman, being somewhat stupid, but he has been at it a VERY long time, so has acquired some skill. He is one of the oldest kobolds in the village.
MobTemplate.Description: &+cA Kobold with rat bones braided into its hair stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Zugwog's attendant is fairly young. He is much more intelligent than Zugwog and will probably surpass his master within a few years. Right now, though, his master is still useful. Maybe that's why he's still alive...
MobTemplate.Description: &+cA kobold stands here, braiding rat bones into Zugwog's hair.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold looks pretty happy with his job. He must have been told he could kill or torture anyone he didn't like. He seems to be eyeing your possessions.
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold wanders about here, scanning for intruders.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is drenched with blood, mostly from the Kobold baker. It seems that he was getting too good at baking, putting a dent in Kwogg's business. He is probably the biggest Kobold you have ever seen, and it looks like he could single-handedly take out the whole village.
MobTemplate.Description: &+LA massive, bloody &n&+rKobold&+L named &+rKwogg&+L stands here.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This fellow is laughed at by the other members of the village. Vegetables!?!? Who would want to eat one of THOSE!?!? Nevermind the fact that he has lived almost twice as long as any other member of the village.
MobTemplate.Description: The Kobold gardener stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: He has a steady hand and looks like he could easily hit a running target.
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold stands here, armed with as many blades as a small army.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is trained in the use of the crossbow. He has his weapon aimed at your neck at all times. It might be a bad idea to provoke him.
MobTemplate.Description: A beady-eyed kobold stands here, holding a crossbow.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This young kobold has seen more training than battle. That doesen't say much, since it is unlikely he has seen a battle yet. Most of these naive warriors are placed in the front ranks where they will most likely be slaughtered.
MobTemplate.Description: A young kobold stands here flirting with a kobold whore.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: &n This kobold has seen many battles and survived somewhat unscathed. He must have mastered the Kobold battle tactics -- go into battle last and slaughter and loot the wounded.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n warrior stands here, looking mean.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Dogface has taken on his nickname just as an excuse to take offense to being called by it. When he's offended, corpses pile up.
MobTemplate.Description: An ugly &+rhalf-breed&n stands here, sharpening a &+Lblade&n.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Ugh. What has this Kobold been eating? You can make out what resembles pieces of worm, moldy braed, and quite possibly even some fecal matter. Looking at him is making you nauseous.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rkobold&n stands here, spewing &+gvo&+Gmi&n&+gt&n all over himself.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This old Kobold is not afraid to complain about anything and everything. He's just too old to care anymore. If you disagree with him, you're just plain wrong.
MobTemplate.Description: An old fisherman stands here, grumbling under his breath about something.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold reeks of fish, body odor, and worms. He actually smells pretty good for a kobold. The fish scent helps cover up the rest of the unpleasantries. He has a few fishhooks stuck into his chest for safekeeping.
MobTemplate.Description: A smelly kobold stands here, chopping up a fish.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold does his best to remain in the shadows, waiting to surprise an unsuspecting victim.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n assassin stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold has a thing or two to learn about pickpocketing if he plans to survive for very long.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n stands here, his eyes fixed intently on your wallet.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: As a dietary supplement, this ugly child is eating a nice, warm meal straight from his nose.
MobTemplate.Description: An ugly Kobold child stands here, picking his nose.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold has just served eleven customers and is trying to get some rest. She hasn't even bothered with bathing, and is smelly and dirty.
MobTemplate.Description: A naked kobold female lies here, trying to sleep.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold must have had human ancestry, since she is easily as attractive as any human woman. She even looks like she bathes regularly. She has no trouble attracting customers and she is probably the wealthiest member of this settlement. But, like anyone that is surrounded by thieves and scoundrels, her fortune is bound to be well-hidden.
MobTemplate.Description: A gorgeous female kobold is here trying to make some money.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: &n When she notices your looking at her, she sizes up your purse, trying to gauge how much you would be willing to pay. She hikes up her skirt a little, hoping to catch your attention.
MobTemplate.Description: A sleezy kobold female is waiting for the next customer.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is old enough to cause as much trouble as an adult Kobold, but young and energetic to be able to run away from the trouble he caused.
MobTemplate.Description: A young Kobold stands here, looking to get into some trouble.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This burly moron is paid to protect the whores of the village while they do business. The pay is nice, but all he really cares about is seeing them take off their clothes.
MobTemplate.Description: A massive kobold stands here, waiting to bash someone's skull in.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This baby's soiled diaper has not been changed in weeks.
MobTemplate.Description: A baby kobold sits here, crying loudly.

MobTemplate.PlayerName: kildra kobold nursemaid fat plump female
MobTemplate.FullDescription: This fat female kobold is nursemaid to the brats of the Kobold village. Rolls of fat cascade over the edge of a pair of leather pants that she wouldn't be able to wear if she hadn't been wearing them for the past six years. She doesen't enjoy the company of the children, but she enjoys the fact that someone actually pays attention to her.
MobTemplate.Description: A plump female kobold stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold makes a decent living on her back, and seems to enjoy it quite a bit. She is dirty and unattractive, but that doesen't seem to matter much to the members of this village.
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold whore lies here waiting to serve a customer.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: When he finishes taking care of his itch, the cook puts the spoon back into the pot and continues stirring. He appears to have a cold of some sort, as a greasy line of snot runs down his face and drips off his chin, right into tonight's special.
MobTemplate.Description: The cook stands here, scratching his ass with a &+ywooden spoon&n.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This hunter appears to have found what he was searching for.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold hunter stands here bargaining with an attractive female kobold.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold is trying to put his sword into the scabbard hilt-first. Apparently, gravel could win a debate with this fellow.
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold stands here, trying to get his sword into its scabbard.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Looking at Yaggra makes you think that looking at him is a bad idea. In fact, being in the same room is quite likely a very bad idea. If he were to decide that you were an eyesore, you would quite likely be dead before you knew he had even moved.
MobTemplate.Description: &+LYaggra&n&+y, master of &+Rthieves&N&+y stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is covered in dust and is harely distinguishable from the shadows. He works in bad conditions for low pay, but makes up for it by stealing from his boss.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stands here, picking away at the wall.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold looks like he would rather break a board over someone's head than pound a nail into one.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stands here, pounding a bent nail into a board.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is just as nuts as the rest of them. Her shirt is drenched with drool and hasn't been changed in weeks.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stands here, slobbering all over herself.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This fellow is competing with the other drooling kobold. So far he has the wettest shirt and largest puddle of drool on the ground. He just may win this contest.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stares intently at the wall, drooling profusely.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold seems to have a nervous system problem, since he just can't stop shaking and twitching.
MobTemplate.Description: A middle-aged Kobold stands here, trying not to look like the warden.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold appears to have firm opinions on the politics of every major leader of every race. His opinions are so firm he can't even win an argument with himself. If he doesen't give up the debate soon, he may end up having to beat himself into submission.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stands here, discussing the politics of the Elven king.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold has been screaming for quite some time now, and is now emitting hoarse shrieks than anything. The shrieking has melodic undertones, and could possibly be made into a song if it wasn't so damned annoying.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stands here, screaming obscenities at furniture.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: The warden looks only slightly more sane than his patients. You notice him twitching and mumbling occasionally for no obvious reason and realize that looks often lie.
MobTemplate.Description: A middle-aged kobold stands here, trying not to look like the patients.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: An ancient kobold stands here, trying to remember his name.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold seems to have forgotten his name.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold has several large scars around his head. After taking an axe to the forehead, a crossbow bolt through the neck, and a pitchfork to the eyeball, he should be more than dead. He must not have enough common sense to know when he's supposed to die.
MobTemplate.Description: A scarred old Kobold doesen't seem aware of his surroundings.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: &n This Kobold appears to have forgotten where he is going, where he has gone, and where he is now. He has lived his whole life in this small village, yet somehow he finds a way to get lost.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold can't seem to remember where he is or where he's going.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This horse has been tortured by the children of the village after being injured in some rough terrain. Many small wounds cover its hide, inflicted by thrown rocks and sticks.
MobTemplate.Description: A horse is here, bleeding from many small wounds.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Elgrik is a big, sooty, ugly kobold whose hands and forearms are scarred from many mishaps with red-hot iron.
MobTemplate.Description: &+LElgrik&n stands here, forging yet another low-quality blade.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is very angry, and he wants everyone to know it.
MobTemplate.Description: &+rA Kobold rampages through here, attacking everything in sight.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: A kobold stands here, unmoving. If you didn't know better, you'd swear he was either a statue or a corpse.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold stands here, impersonating a statue.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This guard is supposed to be on patrol duty right now. Maybe he can concentrate on his duties better with his eyes closed, since all that light could distract him.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold guard rests here, asleep.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: In his other hand, this bastard half-breed holds a handful of dog fur. He seems quite intent on his scratching, and it would take quite a lot of effort to distract him.
MobTemplate.Description: A stupid bastard stands here, scratching his behind.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This mean-looking dog has leaves and clumps of dirt all over its thick, tangled hair.
MobTemplate.Description: A scruffy dog wanders about here, sniffing the ground.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: It looks like this dog's bastard owner has been ripping chunks of fur out of his body. Other than the missing patches of fur, this dog appears to be quite healthy.
MobTemplate.Description: A dog missing patches of fur stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Ogre has been a prisoner for quite some time. By the looks of him his captors have either been too careless or scared to feed him. His last meal appears to be the nearby remains of a Dwarf.
MobTemplate.Description: A skinny ogre stands here, gnawing on some old bones.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: The kobolds keep this fellow around so they have someone to torture. He has long ago given up all hope of escape or rescue, and it just waiting to die.
MobTemplate.Description: An elf sits here, chained to the wall.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold takes pleasure in the pain of others. AND he gets paid for it. Many a villager would love to have his job.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n stands here, playing with tools that look potentially quite painful.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This female kobold is running about, getting drinks for the patrons while trying not to trip in the puddles of beer and other luckily unidentifiable substances on the floor.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n walks through the place, serving and spilling drinks.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold has lost all touch with reality and just wants to see things break.
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold stands here with a wicked grin on his face.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This guard is having a hard time staying awake. Not much happens in the prison, since most criminals end up dying before they reach the prison. The term "criminal" is very ambiguous in this settlement. Crimes generally go unpunished as long as you don't annoy the wrong people, which is usually anyone tougher than yourself.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold guard slouches here, bored out of his mind.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold has a few old rags to be used as bandages and a fishhook with a piece of thread tied to it meant for reattaching limbs. He has not had any useful medical training, but that doesen't seem to matter.
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold stands here, ready to reattach any limbs that might fall off.

MobTemplate.PlayerName: elf elven prisoner half halfelf half-elf
MobTemplate.FullDescription: This prisoner has been treated just as badly as the rest of them. Half of the hair has been torn from his skull and he has long scars along the length of both of his arms.
MobTemplate.Description: A half-elf stands here, hating life.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This prisoner looks like he took an axe to the leg. He is wearing a dirty bandage that probably hasn't been changed in weeks. It's surprising that his leg hasn't fallen off yet with the unclean conditions here.
MobTemplate.Description: A sturdy-looking half-elf with an injured leg rests here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This rat appears to be well-fed, thanks to the cleaning habits of the Kobolds of the village. It is also one of the ugliest, most deformed rats you have ever seen.
MobTemplate.Description: &+LA rat is here, nibbling on some refuse.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This bird is quite possibly one of the fattest vultures ever. The lack of cleanliness in the village allows it to eat better than most of the Koboolds.
MobTemplate.Description: A carrion bird stands here, munching on some unidentified remains.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold has eaten some bad bread, and is paying for it. His face seems to have a sickly greenish tint to it and carried a pained expression.
MobTemplate.Description: A Kobold lies here, groaning and holding his stomach.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This obese fellow is the owner, operator, and chief customer of this bar. The left side of his face is covered almost entirely in hideous warts. The rolls of fat cascade over his belt, and a line of drool runs down his chin, dripping onto his shirt. He appears thoroughly drunk, and probably has been for a few weeks now.
MobTemplate.Description: A fat, slobbering old &+rKobold&n stands here with a stupid grin on his face.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold is almost attractive in a sick, demented sort of way. She is gradually becoming less clothed as the evening moves on. At this point, she is only half-naked. The rest of the patrons are apparently too obliterated to notice her.
MobTemplate.Description: A scantily clad &+rKobold&n is waiting for you to have &+Wsex &nwith her.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is so drunk he can barely stand up. He seems to be a poor fellow, and it is surprising he could afford enough alcohol to get smashed. Or maybe he'll REALLY get smashed when they find out he can't pay his bill.
MobTemplate.Description: A commoner stands here, drunk out of his mind.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold dressed in stylish clothing stolen from a Human trade caravan. He has a confidence about him that betrays the fact that he has killed dozens in cold blood.
MobTemplate.Description: A shifty-eyed &+rKobold&n stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold makes his living by robbing others. Judging by his appearence and clothing, he is pretty successful.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n stands here, plotting his next robbery.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is pretty smooth. If you don't watch out, he'll soon have everything you own before you notice.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n stands here with his hand in your pocket.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: Turog is a heavily muscled kobold with a large head. He has been running the market for many years now and knows how to spot phony goods. Lifting something from this shop just might be a bad idea.
MobTemplate.Description: &+BTurog&n&+b, keeper of the &+LBlack Market&N&+b stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold was locked away quite a while ago for a minor crime. He hasn't been fed in a very long time. He has lost the powers of speech, so it is qutie unlikely anyone will notice him before it is too late.
MobTemplate.Description: A forgotten Kobold prisoner stands here, looking lonely and forelorn.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This young kobold has seen more training than battle. That doesen't say much, since it is unlikely he has seen a battle yet. Most of these naive warriors are placed in the front ranks where they will most likely be slaughtered.
MobTemplate.Description: A young &+rkobold&n stands here, ready to fight.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This miner is covered in dirt, grime, and soot. He is overworked and underpaid, so he robs his employer blind at every opportunity.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n rests here after a long day of work.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This kobold is about as ordinary as a kobold can be. His eyes dart back and forth, as if frantically looking for trouble.
MobTemplate.Description: An average-looking kobold stands here, sizing you up.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold would be hard to distinguish from the remnants of the previous occupant of this building if he wasn't moving around. Why is it that kobolds are just so incredibly ugly?
MobTemplate.Description: A kobold stands here counting the few copper pieces he has stolen.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This rat appears to be well-fed, thanks to the cleaning habits of the Kobolds of the village. It is also one of the ugliest, most deformed rats you have ever seen.
MobTemplate.Description: &+LA rat is here, nibbling on some chunks of flesh.&n

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold does his best to remain in the shadows, waiting to surprise an unsuspecting victim.
MobTemplate.Description: A &+rKobold&n assassin stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This Kobold dressed in stylish clothing stolen from a Human trade caravan. He has a confidence about him that betrays the fact that he has killed dozens in cold blood.
MobTemplate.Description: A shifty-eyed &+rKobold&n stands here.

MobTemplate.FullDescription: This rat appears to be well-fed, thanks to the cleaning habits of the Kobolds of the village. It is also one of the ugliest, most deformed rats you have ever seen.
MobTemplate.Description: &+LA rat is here, nibbling on some refuse.&n

TalkData.Message: He was very good at what he did. In fact he was so good people were going to him for food instead of me. He was cutting into my business, so I decided to cut into his skull...
Eh? Why are you bothering me, dammit! Can't you see I have work to do? Get the heck outta here and leave me be! Wasting my time...
I'm a fisherman, you idiot! Now leave me the hell alone!
